title: I’ve Liked Your Boyfriend for a Long Time - Novel Updates
genre: Romance   School Life   Slice of Life   Yaoi
tags: Adapted to Drama CD   Artists   Calm Protagonist   College/University   Cute Story   Gamers   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Modern Day   Quiet Characters   Secret Crush
author: Jiàng Zi Bèi   酱子贝
description:
Pei Ran discovered two things recently:

1. His boyfriend of 3 years seems to be cheating on him.
2. The way his boyfriend’s roommate looks at him isn’t quite right.>
